snippet: The government has published a public tender for the “development, deployment and operation of a national-level URL filtering and blocking system.”
abstract: Pakistani government, in an effort to tighten its control over the Internet, invites technology companies, academic institutions and other interested parties to submit proposals to develop a $10 million URL filtering and blocking system; unusually open admission of harsh censorship has provoked anger both inside and outside Pakistan.
lead_paragraph: The government has published a public tender for the “development, deployment and operation of a national-level URL filtering and blocking system.”

headline.main: Pakistan Builds Web Wall Out in the Open
headline.print_headline: Pakistan Publicly Seeks Help to Censor the Internet
